title: Someone found themselves in
subTitle: Your story.
p1: The story you shared on HuLib's webapp has touched many people and helped them find empathy.
p2: Someone read it and whispered: 'Ah, so I'm not as alone as I thought.'
p3: If you have more to say, or simply want to reminisce about old memories - let HuLib listen to you again.
p4: Each of your shares is a precious piece, helping this community become warmer and more humane.
p6: for contributing a piece of your heart to make this world a gentler place,
